items._description: A special item that Vehrn won from the arena; only he can equip it.
A special item that Zach won from the arena; only he can equip it.
A special item that Legion won from the arena; only s/he can equip it.
A special item that Meraeador won from the arena; only he can equip it.
A special item that Gloria won from the arena; only she can equip it.
A special item that Elwyen won from the arena; only she can equip it.
A special item that Solaar won from the arena; only he can equip it.
A special item that Sslen'ck won from the arena; only he can equip it.
A special item that Sharla won from the arena; only she can equip it.
A special item that Donovan won from the arena; only he can equip it.
A special item that Mardek won from the arena; only he can equip it.
This is the sword of a mighty warrior, sealed in stasis by a sorcerer who wished to gain strength in battle by absorption rather than by developing his own physical fitness.

In life, this soul was a great sorcerer who possessed the power to move the stars themselves, yet he was never satisfied because his mortality loomed over him. In seeking immortality, he managed to magically remove his soul and preserve it in this state (it feels sort of like a ball of cotton). He grants a fraction of his spiritual power to whoever equips him.
An ancient, golden plate with a rainbow motif. It offers significant protection against all of the elements.

It is traditional for Knights to pray to stars for fortune before a quest. It is said that those of pure heart who prayed with the most selfless intentions and the most passion would meet amongst the crowds of peasants who saw them off a mysterious little white-haired girl, who, with an innocent smile, would wish him luck and present him with this delicate little amulet.
A legendary artefact with amazing power. It turns the wearer into a raging warrior, who attacks with speed and power, but without thought or control.
A legendary artefact with amazing power. It grants the wearer the power of regeneration constantly, and wards against status effects.
A legendary artefact with amazing power. It grants the wearer the power of both physical and magical shields constantly, and defends against the elements.
This belt protects against paralysis and boosts agility.
A coin that supposedly lands more often on its heads side than its tails side when flipped, which is rather superstitiously said to grant its holder improved luck.
A gemstone, cut into a typical 'bone' shape and worn as a brooch. It protects against zombification.
This magical pendant wards the mind against confusion.
An amulet shaped like the Generic Sun Symbol, the holy icon of the deity SOLAK. Increases Spirit.
A finely-crafted bangle set with a valuable, magically enchanted Sapphire. Boosts spirit.
A finely-crafted bangle set with a valuable, magically enchanted Emerald. Boosts vitality.
A set of beads made from lapis lazuli. Elwyen's had them all her life; they were gifted to her upon her birth from a mysterious grandmother.
These these magical boots are invaluably powerful, they're a rather unsightly shade of lime green.
A pair of finely-crafted golden boots, which make the wearer's feet far more nimble than usual.
A ring set with a fire opal, and enchanted by a skilled pyromancer.
A vial of dragon's blood, hung around one's neck like a pendant. It still possesses some magical power even in this state, and protects the wearer from Numbness.
A magical green stone that protects against poison if worn.
A necklace made of green, earthy beads.
A golden glove-type thing that increases strength and defence.
A metal glove-type thing that increases strength and defence.
A ring set with a moonstone. It channels the power of light, protecting its wearer from offensive light-elemental spells, and the status effect Sleep, for some reason.
A ring set with an onyx stone. It channels the powers of darkness, protecting its wearer from both the Dark element and the Blindness status effect.
This tiny ring somehow raises Defence by a whole three points.
This tiny ring somehow raises Defence by a whole two points.
This tiny ring somehow raises Defence by a whole point.
This little ring, set with a blue gem, magically enhances its wearer's mental acuity.
This little ring, set with a yellow gem, magically enhances its wearer's speed.
This little ring, set with a green gem, magically enhances its wearer's physical endurance.
This little ring, set with a red gem, magically enhances its wearer's physical strength.
This little ring, set with a blue gem, magically enhances its wearer's mental acuity.
This little ring, set with a yellow gem, magically enhances its wearer's speed.
This little ring, set with a green gem, magically enhances its wearer's physical endurance.
This little ring, set with a red gem, magically enhances its wearer's physical strength.
An amulet shaped like the Eye of YALORT. Increases Spirit.
An amulet imbued with the Air element. It reduces all air damage inflicted on its wearer by half.
An amulet imbued with the Earth element. It reduces all earth damage inflicted on its wearer by half.
An amulet imbued with the Water element. It reduces all water damage inflicted on its wearer by half.
An amulet imbued with the Fire element. It reduces all fire damage inflicted on its wearer by half.
An amulet shaped like a hollow half-ball, gold on the outside, pitch black on the inside.
A small magical fairy, bound immobile by a powerful spell. Its magic can be used to grant the user Auto-Berserk, but it's highly unethical as the fairy is still alive...
A small magical fairy, bound immobile by a powerful spell. Its magic can be used to grant the user Auto-M.Shield, but it's highly unethical as the fairy is still alive...
A small magical fairy, bound immobile by a powerful spell. Its magic can be used to grant the user Auto-P.Shield, but it's highly unethical as the fairy is still alive...
A small magical fairy, bound immobile by a powerful spell. Its magic can be used to grant the user Auto-Regen, but it's highly unethical as the fairy is still alive...
A small magical fairy, bound immobile by a powerful spell. Its magic can be used to grant the user Auto-Haste, but it's highly unethical as the fairy is still alive...
A tiny little pickaxe on a chain. It was a gift from the miners, for saving them.
A blue crystal which is attuned to the mental wavelengths and mind chakras such that it enhances the potential of the mind of its wearer. Or something like that.
A green crystal which is attuned to the physical wavelengths and body chakras such that it enhances the potential of the body of its wearer. Or something like that.
A delicate brooch made of lapis lazuli and silver, fashioned in the shape of a water lily. It was given to Mardek by Elwyen to show her gratitude.
A delicate silver piece of jewellery. Wear it around your neck.
A necklace, with a simple gear attached. It was enchanted by Meraeador to protect the wearer from being put to sleep.
A powerful amulet shaped like a dragon. It protects against fire and boosts bodily energy output.
